get.description: Get all courses for the admin's university. Admin role required.

post.description: Create a new course for a specific university department. Creates entry in universities.courses. Admin role required.

400.description: Invalid request body or missing required fields

post.description: Create a new department and link it to a specific faculty and university. Creates entry in universities.departments and universities.university_departments. Admin role required.

parameters.description: Department data (department_name required, department_code and alias_name optional)
parameters.name: request

400.description: Invalid request body or missing required fields

get.description: Get all faculties for the university associated with the authenticated admin user
get.summary: Get all faculties for admin's university

post.description: Create a new faculty for the university. Admin role required.
Create a new course group for a specific course. Creates entry in groups.course_groups. Admin role required.

400.description: Invalid request body or missing required fields

get.description: Get all access requests to join university (student/teacher/administration). Admin role required.
get.summary: Get all access requests for administration

post.description: Current authenticated user sends a request to get a role in a university (student/teacher/administration).
post.summary: Request access to join a university

delete.description: Decline access request for user. Admin role required.

post.description: Accept Request of user that want to be (student/teacher/administration), for student field university_department_id is required, course_group_id can be skipped. For administrations university_id is required, faculty_id can be skipped
post.summary: Accept Request for adding in University

get.description: Verify if the provided JWT access token is valid

post.description: Authenticate user using MAX WebApp init data and return JWT tokens
Refresh access and refresh tokens using a valid refresh token

get.description: Get all departments for faculty by faculty ID
Get all faculties for university by university ID
Get all course groups for department by department ID
Get all students for course group by group ID
Get all teachers for university by university ID
Get all universities where the authenticated user has access (as admin or student)
get.summary: Get all universities for authenticated person

get.description: Get all subjects for university by university ID with pagination
get.summary: Get all subjects by university ID

post.description: Create a new subject for the university. Admin role required.

delete.description: Delete subject by subject ID. Admin role required.

get.description: Get a list of all universities with their detailed information

500.description: Internal server error - failed to get universities

get.description: Get all events for the university associated with the authenticated user
get.summary: Get all events for user's university

post.description: Create a new event for the university. Admin role required.

400.description: Invalid request body or missing required fields

get.description: Get detailed information about the university associated with the authenticated user
get.summary: Get university information for current user

500.description: Internal server error - failed to get university info

post.description: Create or replace semester periods for specific university. Admin role required. This operation will delete all existing semesters for the university and create new ones.
post.summary: Create new semester periods for university

400.description: Invalid request body or date format

get.description: Get detailed information about the authenticated user including roles

description.example: One of the leading Russian universities in the field of information technology, optical design, and engineering.
